South Light Chinese Take Away Restaurant
Nitshill Road, Glasgow, Lanarkshire
Welcome to South Light Chinese Take Away Fast Food restaurant in Glasgow, Lanarkshire. For information about our menu, opening times, or to book a table at South Light Chinese Take Away restaurant, please phone our main telephone number on 01418805146.
Check out our full list of restaurants in Glasgow , or see a list of other restaurants that are close to South Light Chinese Take Away in Glasgow below.
